organization.fullName: The First Hospital of Jilin University

identificationModule.briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Levofloxacin Combined With Intravenous Thrombolysis for Acute Ischemic Stroke
identificationModule.officialTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Levofloxacin Combined With Intravenous Thrombolysis for Acute Ischemic Stroke

responsibleParty.investigatorTitle: Associated Dean of First Hospital of Jilin University
responsibleParty.investigatorAffiliation: The First Hospital of Jilin University

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of levofloxacin combined with intravenous thrombolysis in treating acute ischemic stroke
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Acute ischemic stroke is a leading cause of disability and mortality. Intravenous thrombolysis is a major therapy for acute ischemic stroke, however, nearly half of patients failed to benefit from it. It is necessary to find new interventions combined to intravenous thrombolysis, which promote the efficacy of intravenous thrombolysis. The investigators' previous studies suggested levofloxacin to be a newly identified neuro-protective agent, which could reduce infarct volume and improve neurologic function in animal models. To evaluate the efficacy and safety of levofloxacin combined with intravenous thrombolysis in treating acute ischemic stroke patients, the prospective, multicenter and randomized controlled trial was designed.

armGroups.label: Levofloxacin group
armGroups.description: Levofloxacin 200mg twice per day is administrated.

armGroups.label: Levofloxacin simulant group
armGroups.description: Levofloxacin simulant 200mg twice per day is administrated.

interventions.name: Levofloxacin
interventions.description: Levofloxacin is a quinolone antibiotics and newly identified neuro-protective agent. Intravenous thrombolysis is one of the treatments for acute ischemic stroke.

interventions.name: Levofloxacin simulant
interventions.description: Levofloxacin simulant is placebo. Intravenous thrombolysis is one of the treatments for acute ischemic stroke.

primaryOutcomes.measure: National Institute of Health stroke scale (NIHSS)
primaryOutcomes.description: NIHSS ranged from 0 to 42, a low value represents a better outcome
NIHSS ranged from 0 to 42, a low value represents a better outcome

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Hemorrhagic transformation and symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage
secondaryOutcomes.description: defined by computed tomography (CT) brain scan showed bleeding and a concomitant increase in National Institute of Health stroke scale (NIHSS) score of ≥4 points.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Infarct volume after 3 days of Levofloxacin/simulant treatment
secondaryOutcomes.description: assessed by magnetic resonance imaging brain scan
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Immediately after 3 days of Levofloxacin/simulant treatment

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Modified rankin scale (mRS) score at 30 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: mRS ranged from 0 to 6, a low value represents a better outcome
mRS ranged from 0 to 6, a low value represents a better outcome
